name: Crashed Landing GGJ-2021
description:
This game was created during the Global Game Jam of 2021 by team BSOD (Blue Screen of Death).

The player has to escape a maze within a time limit by finding artifacts. These artifacts are found by solving puzzel rooms in the maze.

Controls: 

WASD -> Movement

Mouse -> Look around

Left mouse button -> action key (Pressing buttons, grab, shoot etc)
